storyInfo:
In the heart of Chernobog, a young girl awakens the person within the coffin - the Doctor.
The girl, named Amiya, tries to explain the situation to the Doctor, but the Reunion Movement suddenly attacks them at this time.

attributes.content: Ah, it's you.
It's been a long time since we've last seen each other.
During this time... you've been teetering on the edge of a cliff.
You may have forgotten who you are, but just remembering your name is enough.
...It's time. Don't linger here for too long.
After all, you aren't my guest yet, nor should you even be here.
She still needs you.
December 23rd.
You may not remember what this date means to you.
And this will thrust you into peril.
No...
You must try to remember.
...consciousness...
attributes.name: Distant Voice

attributes.content: Circulation resumed... vitals stabilized... cardioplegia solution injected...
attributes.name: Distant Voice

attributes.content: Body temperature low... administering Hexamethasone 20 c.c., now...
attributes.name: Distant Voice

attributes.content: Get the hemostat!
attributes.name: Distant Voice

attributes.content: ...Conditions stable... beginning resection... be careful of VFib...
attributes.name: Distant Voice

attributes.content: ...Sorry...
attributes.name: Distant Voice

attributes.content: For making you suffer again...
attributes.name: Distant Voice

attributes.content: Doctor...
...hand!
Take my...
Take my hand!!
Emergency...
...Help...
...It's done...!
Doctor, Doctor!
Medic, how's Doctor doing?
But, just a moment ago... we were holding hands...
So why... why is Doctor still not waking up...?
Amiya! Don't panic, just calm down first!
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: Ah... S-sorry.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You always get so flustered when it comes to the doctor.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: But, Amiya, if the worst came to pass... what would you do then?
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: ...I'm already mentally prepared for that. We would continue to follow the plan.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...I understand. Anyway, I'll do what you requested.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: All right... I appreciate it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: About the Doctor...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Don't worry, Amiya. All the vital signs are stable now.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: I'll do one more inspection, just for you.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: Thank you... Thank you very much!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Mhm. Breathing is slightly shallow, but blood pressure is normal. There should be no cause for concern.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: Are you awake?
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: Amiya, it's a success! The Doctor has woken up!
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: Doctor...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm so happy... Doctor...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ah, careful! You mustn't do that...
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: Don't try to move yet. Your body still hasn't fully adapted to this.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: Doctor...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ah, Doctor... It's me...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's me, Amiya.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We've come to rescue you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You're a member of Rhodes Island, just like us...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...as well as my partner.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You're the most important person to me.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor... you don't remember?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: ...Can I trust you?;...;I see... Pleased to meet you, Amiya.

attributes.content: I understand. I know this is a bit much to take in right now.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I don't expect you to remember everything right away, and I'm not asking you to trust me right now.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, do you really not remember me at all...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Even if that's the case... I won't give up.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We've already sacrificed so much, just to find you...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ah, um, hello.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I, I don't know how to put this, but so many things have changed from before.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That includes me as well.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: However, you'll always be the most important person to me, Doctor. No matter what happens, this will never change.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: So that's why, please... give me a little more time.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: However little it might be...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Does the doctor... really have amnesia?
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: I'm sure everything will be fine if we give Doctor some space...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's safe here—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Huh? What's happening—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya, we've got a problem!
attributes.name: Heavily-Armed Man

attributes.content: Someone broke into the facility!
attributes.name: Heavily-Armed Man

attributes.content: The way they're dressed... they don't look like Ursus soldiers!
attributes.name: Heavily-Armed Man

attributes.content: What's the meaning of this?!
attributes.name: Heavily-Armed Man

attributes.content: They're attacking! Amiya, they're heavily equipped with weapons!
attributes.name: Heavily-Armed Man

attributes.content: Aaaahh!
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: Be careful, everyone! Take cover, and protect Doctor!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: These outfits... are they from the Reunion Movement? But how is that possible...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Guards, prepare for battle!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Roger!
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: Curses... Are they after the Doctor?!
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: No... Nobody else should know about the Doctor being here.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Are you able to reach Kal'tsit?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm not sure why, but the equipment isn't working!
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: ...Someone has cut off our communications.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Have we been discovered by the Ursus government?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What do we do now?
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: Kal'tsit won't be able to command the battle as we had originally planned.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I hope that... you'll be able to take command.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Isn't that a bit too risky? The Doctor only just came to...
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: I'd like... to give it a try.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Even without memories, Doctor has...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...fought alongside us before.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Thank you for all of your guidance...
We've been through so much together...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor... I just know that you'll be able to do it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I know that you'll lead us to victory.
I understand that asking you to do this is very sudden and inconsiderate.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But... Please, lend us your aid.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We'll be supporting you!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Let's push them back first!;...;We have no choice but to fight back, right?

attributes.content: Mm... I don't want to drag you into this.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But right now, we need your wisdom more than ever, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I hope that a part of you will reawaken during combat.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Even though you might have doubts about yourself...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But I believe in you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I know you can do this.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Please take command... of Rhodes Island!
attributes.name: Amiya
